Event.Message: A new deployment session was created with session ID %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_SessionId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A new deployment session was created with session ID %1 for update '%2' that is part of flight '%3'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_SessionId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_UpdateId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_FlightId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to create a new deployment session with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to create a new deployment session for update '%1' that is part of flight '%2'. The error was %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_UpdateId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_FlightId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to generate a list of files to download with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Update of product '%1' to version '%2' failed to generate a list of files to download with error %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_ProductId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_ProductVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Requesting %1 files with total size %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_NumFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_RequestSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to install updates with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Update of product '%1' to version '%2' failed to install updates with error %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_ProductId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_ProductVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Update '%2' encountered install error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Win32Error" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Prop_UnicodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Update '%2' encountered import error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Win32Error" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Prop_UnicodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Update '%2' should have already existed on the machine, but was missing. Error = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Win32Error" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Prop_UnicodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Installation of update set '%1' requires the system to be rebooted
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Installation of update '%1' requires the system to be rebooted
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Installation of update set '%1' is complete. %2 updates out of %3 updates were successfully installed in %4 milliseconds
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_SetId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_SuccessfulUpdates" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_TotalUpdates" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_ElapsedMilliseconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Updated product '%1' to version '%2'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_ProductId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_ProductVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to commit updates with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to clean up updates with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to cancel updates with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Updates were cancelled with reason %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to merge updates with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to get update result post reboot with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Updated product '%1' to last activated version '%2'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_ProductId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_ProductVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Product '%1' was not updated to last activated version '%2'. Missing updates: %3 Missing drivers: %4 Unpublished drivers: %5 Published drivers: %6 Analysis errors: %7
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_ProductId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_ProductVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_MissingUpdates" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_MissingDrivers" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_UnpublishedDrivers" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_PublishedDrivers" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Prop_AnalysisErrorDrivers" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to perform post download operation with error %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parsed manifest for product '%1' at version '%2' is not greater than currently installed version '%3'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Prop_ProductId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_Version1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Prop_Version2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
